meta.job_title: Data governance SME in Health Care

duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and synthesize legislation and determine applicability to HHS data governance.
Formulate strategy of HHS data governance and translate it into a plan of action.
Draft policy for Federal Agencies and conduct and document policy review processes.
Translate data governance principals into tangible action plans and work with senior leadership in large organizations.
Lead and facilitate work groups across diverse stakeholder groups and use tools and techniques to facilitate work group discussions.
Work in health care, Federal agencies with health-related missions, and have knowledge of a broad range of public health services and issues.
Have knowledge of health care data, health care data standards, and understanding of health care data challenges.
Engage users in defining requirements, collaborate with developers to understand user requirements, conduct surveys and interviews, and synthesize data and interview findings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Health Care, Policy, or a related field (Master's preferred)
